title: Toni Tone: There's so much black people are experiencing beyond racism
description: Toni Tone, star of Channel 4 show Highlife, on why a black British reality series is overdue.

title: DP: Netflix's South Korean show exposing the military's dark side
description: A culture of abuse as depicted by Netflix show DP has hit too close to home for many viewers.

title: Kristen Stewart: Why playing Princess Diana made me really nervous
description: The actress was so anxious about starring in the film Spencer that her jaw temporarily locked shut.

title: Week in pictures: 2-8 October 2021
description: A selection of powerful images from all over the globe, taken this week.

title: 'Work has been therapy for my mental health'
description: NHS England wants to get more people with severe mental illness back to the workplace.

title: Poland stokes fears of leaving EU in 'Polexit'
description: By challenging the core primacy of EU law, Poland fuels concerns it is heading towards the exit.

title: On patrol with a real-life Robocop
description: Police are using a robot to fight crime in Los Angeles.

title: Ward will 'bounce back' from error, says Wales boss Page
description: Wales manager Robert Page says goalkeeper Danny Ward will "bounce back" after his error in Friday's World Cup qualifying draw with the Czech Republic.

title: Tyson Fury v Deontay Wilder III: Who will win trilogy bout in Las Vegas?
description: One of 2021's most anticipated bouts will take place in Las Vegas on Saturday as Tyson Fury and Deontay Wilder meet for a third time.

title: Hong Kong: University orders Tiananmen statue's removal
description: The statue at the University of Hong Kong commemorates the 1989 Tiananmen Square massacre.

title: Lyra McKee arrests highlight radicalisation, police warn
description: A number of young people are facing charges in connection with New IRA violence.

title: Kristen Stewart plays Princess Diana in new film Spencer
description: Twilight's Kristen Stewart is the latest actress to take on the role of Diana, Princess of Wales.

title: Sam Fender admits to being 'really hungover' in BBC Breakfast interview
description: The musician and die-hard Newcastle fan travelled up to St James' Park to celebrate the club's takeover.

title: Malan, Robinson & Leach get England contracts but Sibley loses his
description: Dawid Malan, Ollie Robinson and Jack Leach are awarded England central contracts for the first time, but Dom Sibley loses his.

title: Farmer's emotional plea to PM to 'save our bacon'
description: "Come and speak to me, Boris Johnson, have the guts to stand up", Kate Morgan says.

title: Insulate Britain: Protesters block Old Street roundabout and M25 junction
description: Police make 35 arrests in the group's 12th day of protest in the past four weeks.

title: Adele says new album will explain her divorce to her young son
description: The pop superstar gives her first interviews for five years, ahead of the release of her new album.

title: COP26: Pope will not travel to Glasgow for climate summit
description: The Vatican confirms that Pope Francis will not attend the UN climate conference in Scotland.

title: Tory MP and ex-Northern Ireland Secretary James Brokenshire dies, aged 53
description: The ex-minister and father-of-three first quit the cabinet in 2018 after being diagnosed with lung cancer.

title: Covid: Shapps hopes travel test changes happen by end of half-term holidays
description: The transport secretary plans to replace the expensive PCR Covid tests needed after entering the UK.

title: Jaffa Cakes allegation prompts Halifax PC's misconduct hearing
description: PC Chris Dwyer is alleged to have taken two packets from a police station tuck shop without paying.

title: Nobel Peace Prize: Journalists Maria Ressa and Dmitry Muratov share award
description: The Philippine and Russian editors win jointly for their fights to defend freedom of expression.

title: What are Insulate Britain and Extinction Rebellion and what do they want?
description: Insulate Britain protesters have blocked roads around London, demanding action on climate change.

title: NFL: Los Angeles Rams beat Seattle Seahawks - watch the best plays
description: Watch the best plays as Matthew Stafford and Darrell Henderson lead the Los Angeles Rams to a 26-17 win against the Seattle Seahawks.

title: Turkish Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton takes engine penalty
description: Lewis Hamilton has a 10-place grid demotion at Sunday's Turkish Grand Prix after receiving a penalty for using too many engine parts.

title: Energy prices: Significant rises to come, says regulator Ofgem
description: Households will again see big rises in energy bills next spring, warns regulator Ofgem.

title: Liverpool: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain owes keeper Alisson's gloves after MOTDx skills challenge
description: Liverpool's Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain takes on a MOTDx skills challenge with Liam MacDevitt and ends up owing the goalkeeper, Jack, a pair of Alisson's gloves.

title: Newcastle United takeover: Joyous scenes as fans celebrate new era
description: Huge crowds of Magpies fans gathered outside the club's stadium to celebrate the start of a new era.

title: Ronaldo civil rape case must be dismissed, says US judge
description: A judge recommends that the civil rape case made against Manchester United forward Cristiano Ronaldo in the United States is thrown out of court.

title: Millions urged to get flu jab and Covid booster this winter
description: Experts are worried as this will be the first winter Covid and flu circulate fully at the same time.

title: Newcastle takeover heartbreaking, says Khashoggi fiancee
description: The fiancee of murdered journalist Jamal Khashoggi says the Saudi Arabian-backed takeover of Newcastle United is "heartbreaking" for her.

title: Duolingo boss plans to take on TikTok with maths
description: Luis von Ahn boss of language-learning app Duolingo, talks about taking on TikTok with a maths app.

title: David A Lindon's micro art masterpieces sell for £90,000

title: Tyson Fury v Deontay Wilder III: Is the Gypsy King ready for trilogy fight after chaotic camp?
description: Tyson Fury takes on Deontay Wilder in their trilogy fight, but is the Gypsy King ready to face the Bronze Bomber after a chaotic few months?

title: 'I turned Marge Simpson yellow - it was so scary'
description: West Lothian woman tells of how a dangerous medical condition turned her skin a golden yellow.

title: The Papers: Warnings of a 'flu war' and 'new c-c-cold war'
description: The papers cover concerns about flu deaths this winter and Russia's role in rising energy costs.

title: Jesy Nelson samples P Diddy on her first single since leaving Little Mix
description: The star's first song since leaving Little Mix is based around a hefty sample from Bad Boys For Life.

title: Doctors alerted to dangerous dry scooping workout trend
description: Pre-workout powders should be diluted in water, but some gym-goers are eating it neat.

title: Sam Fender says he considered dealing drugs, before music offered a way out
description: The singer nearly followed friends into the drug trade - then music opened a different door.
